problem_text:
16.7. Is it true that the membership problem is undecidable for any semidirect product Fn ⋋Fn of non-abelian free groups Fn?
An affirmative answer would imply an answer to 6.24.
Recall that the membership problem is decidable for Fn (M. Hall, 1949) and undecidable for Fn × Fn (K. A. Mikhailova, 1958).
V. G. Bardakov
